Eric Schmidt also challenged the assertion that Google is locked in a competitive battle with Facebook.`` We have a competitor called Microsoft,'' he said. Microsoft has more cash, more engineers, more global reach. We see competition from Microsoft every day. Facebook, on the other hand,`` has clearly stated they don't want to get into the search business. Facebook users tend to use Google search. Facebook's ads business does not displace our advertising.

Deputy Prime Minister Nick Clegg has denied the government has been damaged by the row surrounding the departure of Mr Andy Coulson . Mr Andy Coulson has denied knowledge of any hacking when he was editor and Mr Nick Clegg said he had no reason to disbelieve him .
